name: Best Logo Slider
author: WPdivine

sections.description:
Using “Best logo slider” you can show logo in anywhere of your website using shortcode.

“Best logo slider” plugin is simple but flexible & powerful.

  • [View live Demos ] ( http://client.wpdivine.com/ )
  • Documentation
  • Support
  • Contact Us

Plugin Features

  • Client / Partner / Logo slider
  • Client / Partner Logo grid section
  • Easy to add in page /post / widget using shortcode.
  • 100% Responsive code.
  • Easy to use.
  • Developer friendly & easy to customize.

Shortcode

(1) Use following shortcode to display clients, partners or sponsors Logo like Carousel logo slider.

[client_owl count=”6″ ]

(2) Use following shortcode to display clients, partners or sponsors Logo like Logo Grid.
[client count=”5″ column=”5″ row=”1″ border=”1px” p_id=”41″ ]

Do you need any more help?

  • View live Demos
  • [Documentation (http://client.wpdivine.com/documentation/ )
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Dashboard > Clients to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
How do I add new Logo?

To add new logo, go to Clients > Add New Client , then add Client Name, Client Logo , Client Email, Client Url. Then Publish it.

What will be logo image dimension?

Default image size set to 150px X 150 px.

How to use shortcode in page templates?

““
